verbs.description: [ARG2: snow] [V: covers] [ARG1: colorado] [ARGM-TMP: on halloween] causes slick travel and accidents a heavy layer of snow covered areas of colorado on wednesday oct 31 many woke up on halloween morning to find their yards covered in a blanket of snow following unseasonable warmth on monday temperatures plummeted across the region on tuesday for example in colorado springs temperatures peaked at 76 f on monday and fell to the low 30s on tuesday night the nearby air force academy recorded temperatures as low as 27 f on tuesday night paul asay colorado cdot twitter snow denver accuweather colorado springs colorado air force academy colorado department of transportation colorado springs
